desc_short: Boost ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR by 30% (Not stackable)
提高30%攻擊防禦魔力精神 [無法重複裝備]
공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력 30% 상승  [중복 장착 불가]
Augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY de 30% (pas cumulable)
Erhöht ANG, ABW, MAG u. PSY um 30% (Nicht stapelbar)
Aumenta ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP un 30% (no acumulable)
desc_long: Boosts ATK, DEF, MAG and SPR by 30%. Not stackable.
提高30%攻擊防禦魔力精神的數值。無法重複裝備。
공격력, 방어력, 마력, 정신력이 30% 상승합니다. [중복 장착 불가]
Augmente l'ATT, la DEF, la MAGIE et la PSY de 30%. Pas cumulable.
Erhöht ANG, ABW, MAG u. PSY um 30%. Nicht stapelbar.
Aumenta ATQ, DEF, MAG y ESP un 30%. No acumulable.
